title: GNU Privacy Guard
extract: GNU Privacy Guard, a free-software replacement for Symantec's PGP cryptographic software suite, complies with RFC 4880, the IETF standards-track specification of OpenPGP. Modern versions of PGP are interoperable with GnuPG and other OpenPGP-compliant systems.
extract_html: GNU Privacy Guard, a free-software replacement for Symantec's PGP cryptographic software suite, complies with RFC 4880, the IETF standards-track specification of OpenPGP. Modern versions of PGP are interoperable with GnuPG and other OpenPGP-compliant systems.
